Uses of Interface
space.arim.universal.util.Util

  • Packages that use Util 
    Package Description
    space.arim.universal.events  
    space.arim.universal.util  

    • Uses of Util in space.arim.universal.events

      Methods in space.arim.universal.events that return Util 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Util UniversalEvents.getUtil() 
      Util Events.getUtil()
      Gets the Util instance corresponding to this event manager.

    • Uses of Util in space.arim.universal.util

      Classes in space.arim.universal.util that implement Util 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  UniversalUtil
      UniversalUtil: Main class

      The most common usage of this class is to check synchronisation: UniversalUtil.isAsynchronous()

      To retrieve an instance:
      * UniversalUtil.get()
      * UniversalUtil.getByClass(Class)
      * UniversalUtil.threadLocal()
      * UniversalUtil.getOrDefault(Class, Supplier)
      Methods in space.arim.universal.util that return Util 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Util UniversalUtil.get()
      Gets the main Util instance
      static Util UniversalUtil.getByClass(Class<?> clazz)
      Retrieves a Util instance by class.
      static Util UniversalUtil.getOrDefault(Class<?> clazz, Supplier<Util> defaultSupplier)
      Gets a Util instance by class with a default value, issued by the Supplier, if it does not exist.
      Methods in space.arim.universal.util that return types with arguments of type Util 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ThreadLocal<Util> UniversalUtil.threadLocal()
      Util instances are thread safe; however, you may wish for a thread specific instance.
      Method parameters in space.arim.universal.util with type arguments of type Util 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Util UniversalUtil.getOrDefault(Class<?> clazz, Supplier<Util> defaultSupplier)
      Gets a Util instance by class with a default value, issued by the Supplier, if it does not exist.
